3. For i = 1 to 5
4.     Sum = Sum + i
5. End For
6. Print Sum

X = 10
IF X > 5 THEN
IF X < 20 THEN
PRINT 1
ELSE
PRINT 2
ENDIF
ELSE
PRINT 3
ENDIF

START
N = 4
WHILE N > 0
PRINT N
N = N - 1
END WHILE
STOP

What will be the output?
X = 17
IF X % 2 == 0 THEN
PRINT 1
ELSE
PRINT 0
ENDIF

What will be the output?
Start
Sum = 0
For i = 1 to 6
If i % 2 == 0
Sum = Sum + i
EndIf
EndFor
Print Sum
Stop

For i = 1 to 3
For j = 1 to 3
Count = Count + 1
EndFor
EndFor

Stop

What will be the output?
I = 1
WHILE I <= 5
IF I == 3 THEN
BREAK
ENDIF
PRINT I
I = I + 1
END WHILE
